description: You find yourself in a wizards forest cabin filled with alchemical instruments and glowing runes.

rooms.description: Scrolls and books lie open on a rune-etched desk. A cauldron bubbles mysteriously.
Glowing herbs sway in the moonlight. A stone arch leads deeper into the forest.
Dusty tomes line every wall. A magical barrier shimmers near a hidden door.

cauldron.name: Bubbling Cauldron
cauldron.description: A large iron cauldron with a mysterious glowing liquid inside.

scroll.name: Ancient Scroll
scroll.description: A yellowed scroll covered in arcane symbols and spells.

crystal.name: Glowing Crystal
crystal.description: A crystal orb that pulses with magical energy.

herb.name: Luminescent Herb
herb.description: A magical herb that glows softly in the moonlight.

archway.name: Stone Archway
archway.description: An ancient archway covered in ivy and runes.

book.name: Spell Book
book.description: A leather-bound tome filled with powerful spells.

barrier.name: Magical Barrier
barrier.description: A shimmering magical barrier blocking a hidden passage.

wand.name: Wizard's Wand
wand.description: An ornate wooden wand that tingles with power.
